# How to Use Localized App Compromise Notifications on Appdome

Last updated July 21, 2025 by Appdome

Appdome detects various security threats to mobile applications during runtime. When a threat is detected, a policy-driven app compromise notification can be triggered. Utilizing localized app compromise notifications, Appdome ensures that these alerts are relevant and understandable across different geolocations, presented in the user’s native language.

## How to Add Localized App Compromise Notifications

The Localized Messages option is located in the User Experience Options under the App Compromise Notification field. Here’s how you can implement localized app compromise notifications for a more targeted user response:

1. Click the **+ Add Localization File** option to upload the Localized Messages JSON/CSV file.  
   [![Screenshot 2025 07 21 At 12.15.58](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Screenshot-2025-07-21-at-12.15.58.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Screenshot-2025-07-21-at-12.15.58.png)  
   The selected file will be added to the build.  
   [![App Compromise Localized](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/App_Compromise_Localized.png)](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/App_Compromise_Localized.png)

## How to Configure the JSON/CSV File

This field receives a JSON file containing a message for each language requested. A complete list of language codes can be found on the Localization page at: <https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/android/client-side/localization>.

To download the JSON/CSV File example, [click here.](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/localized_messages.zip)

**Note**: An option for a short localized message to replace the short compromise notification is also available (Android only), including the use of the *{{app\_display\_name}}* tag. The tag will be replaced with the app display name in the current device language.

The JSON file is structured as follows:

```
{
   "en":{
      "default": "english msg for {{app_display_name}} ",
      "short": "English short for {{app_display_name}} "
   },
   "fr":{
      "default": "french msg for {{app_display_name}} ",
      "short": "fr short for {{app_display_name}} "
   },
   "en_eu":{
      "default": "australian msg for {{app_display_name}} ",
      "short": "au short for {{app_display_name}} "
   }
}
```

The CSV File is structured as follows:

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Language Code** | **Default Message** | **Short Message** |
| en | Welcome to my app! | Welcome |
| fr\_ | Bienvenue sur mon appli! | Bienvenue |
| it | Benvenuto nella mia app! | Benvenuto |
| ru\_RU | Добро пожаловать в наше приложение! | Добро пожаловать |
